title: Customers
body:
Customers¶

Note

g

  1. Click the <i class=”fa fa-bars”></i> menu icon in the ribbon

  2. Click Finance

  3. Click Revenue

  4. Click Customers

  5. Click on a customer to view their recorded financial and transactional information

  6. Creating a new credit for the customer:

    • Click the <i class=”fa fa-ellipsis-v”></i> ellipsis icon in the upper right hand corner

    • Click Create Credit

    • Choose the program for which you are granting the credit

    • Enter a description of the credit

    • Enter the amount you want to grant for the credit

    • Click Save

  7. Creating a new scholarship for the customer:

    • Click the <i class=”fa fa-ellipsis-v”></i> ellipsis icon in the upper right hand corner

    • Click Create Scholarship

    • Choose the program for which you are granting the scholarship

    • Enter a description of the scholarship

    • Enter the amount you want to grant for the scholarship

    • Click Save
